name: Niravee
0:
”Alexa, turn on Kitchen Light”
”Alexa, turn off Kitchen Light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
1) Register and Login with https://niravee.com

2) Add switch devices using add device option

3) Link Niravee skill using niravee.com credentials.

4) After successfully linked with Niravee skill then say to Alexa: "Alexa, discover devices".

5) After added devices to Alexa, Say to Alexa, Ex: "Alexa, turn on Kitchen Light".

6) Say to Alexa: "Alexa, turn off Kitchen Light".


For Any ESP8266 based Hardware:

1) After successfully login, Download Arduino based code from https://niravee.com/ESPCode for ESP8266 

2) Configure device id which provided by https://niravee.com and flash the downloaded code to ESP8266 with Arduino studio.

2) Enjoy to say Ex: "Alexa, turn on Kitchen light"
